data.text: @Bill_Dauster @Lawrence @pewresearch We used to be horrified (correctly) when Covid hit that death count.  Biden is as scared shitless as Trump was to raise the warning flag.

@Bill_Dauster @Laurie_Garrett @pewresearch The company I work for lifted its mask mandate if you are vaccinated... A bunch of people are not & are working with no masks. I continue to wear my mask. I would anyway 😷🧡
@Bill_Dauster @Lawrence @pewresearch 98% unvaccinated. We've done all we can for them. High risk humans continue to take all precautions.
@Bill_Dauster @Lawrence @pewresearch Every other indicator says that we will have more waves in autumn and Flu season. This is not over yet
@Bill_Dauster @Lawrence @pewresearch Mostly republicans. One can decide for themselves if that is a good, bad, or indifferent thing.

@Bill_Dauster @mms5048 @pewresearch Seems really premature to eliminate mask mandates when we know vaccine efficacy will start to gradually decrease.
Watch the curve for any increase in the next few weeks.
We never learn.
It’s only over once it’s over, when hundreds are not dying every day

@Bill_Dauster @pewresearch This is the chart that made me reassess whether I should still be wearing a mask. The existing pattern seems to indicate this is the usual seasonal decline, but who knows if we'll have another spike at the end of the summer... I'll keep protecting myself with a mask for now.
